document_data.name: Gastyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Gastyn''' was head of the servants in Lord [[Marsten]]'s hunting lodge.
document_data.History: Gastyn was head butler for Lord Marsten until, some time before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]], his master was killed and the lodge occupied by [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents under [[Talis Kasterel]]. She decide to use Gastyn and other servants as her own.
